    • killMonster

      public void killMonster(Monster monster)
      Removes monster from monsters list. Adds gold reward of monster. Updates info panel.
      Parameters:
      monster -

    • addGold

      public void addGold(int reward)
      Adds reward to gold variable. Updates info panel.
      Parameters:
      reward - reward amount of monster

    • removeLife

      public void removeLife()
      Removes one life from player. If player lost oll of lives game is over.

    • setActiveGridPos

      public void setActiveGridPos(Vector2D pos)
      Sets active grid position which is clicked area of tower grid. If position is outside of the area it removes current active position.
      Parameters:
      pos - snapped position of mouse input according to tower grid.

    • checkForBuildTower

      public void checkForBuildTower(char c)
      Checks tower grid to place selected tower . If position is available creates new tower according to parameter.
      Parameters:
      c - user keyboard input which tells tower type.

    • updateTower

      public void updateTower(Tower tower, int kills)
      Updates tower decoration after reaching certain amount of kills.
      Parameters:
      tower - tower will be decorated.
      kills - kill count of that tower.

    • paint

      public void paint(Graphics g)
      Paints monsters, towers and active grid position every frame.

    • step

      public void step()
      Core game loop called in every frame which updates game.

    • startGame

      public static void startGame()
      Starts game.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
